extendedInfo.description: Billiard Bubble Shoot - Billiard balls version of Bubble Shooter is the best in bubble shoot game. There are more then 300 difficult levels. Shoot as fast as possible to clean all lines of Billiard Balls. Billiard  Bubble Shooter is the oldest and most played of the bubble shooting games.How to play:1.Tap where you want the billiard bubble shoot.2.To group 3 or more billiard balls to make them burst.Tag: bubble shoot, bubble shooter, billiard, balls, pool, pop, breaker, bubbles, balls, bong, bubble blast, bubble blaster, bubble shot, bubbles, bubble buster.
